verses.name: Jeremiah 5:8
verses.text: They were as fed horses in the morning: every one neighed after his neighbour’s wife.

verses.name: Jeremiah 5:9
verses.text: Shall I not visit for these things? saith the Lord: and shall not my soul be avenged on such a nation as this?

verses.name: Jeremiah 5:10
verses.text: Go ye up upon her walls, and destroy; but make not a full end: take away her battlements; for they are not the Lord’s.

verses.name: Jeremiah 5:11
verses.text: For the house of Israel and the house of Judah have dealt very treacherously against me, saith the Lord.
